short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to share your screen to other users in the IceWarp WebClient.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IceWarp WebClient is an all-in-one hub for your messaging communications, whether email, instant messaging, voice, online conferencing, document management, and more. Accessible from your desktop or on-the-go, you are truly able to access everything you need during your workday while never leaving the IceWarp interface.
